thread.title: Diary of a shelter cat hoping for a home
thread.title_full: Diary of a shelter cat hoping for a home

title: Diary of a shelter cat hoping for a home
text:
Diary of a shelter cat hoping for a home 0 comments 
My brother Frank and I grew up together in a home where we loved to sit by our human mom's feet as she knitted, and where we used to love to cuddle up with her on her bed each night. 
One day, our human mom wasn't there anymore. Instead, there were strange people in the house and a lot of chatter. After several days of this, a man herded us into a cage, took us for a car ride, and we wound up here -- in a strange new place with a lot of yelping dogs and other cats. kAmuC2?< 2?5 x H6C6 AFE :? 2 3:8 C@@> H:E9 E@JD[ 365D[ =:EE6C 3@I6D[ 2?5 2 H:?5@H] xE H2D?VE E@@ 325] (6 4@F=5 D:E E@86E96C 2?5 =@@< @FE E96 H:?5@H] (6 D2H E96 52?56=:@?D A@A FA :?
